snippet: President Obama this week will direct the Labor Department to revamp its regulations to require overtime pay for millions of workers.
abstract: Pres Obama will seek to force American businesses to pay more overtime to millions of workers, latest move by his administration to confront corporations that have had soaring profits even as wages have stagnated; Obama will direct the Labor Dept to revamp its regulations to require overtime pay for those whom many businesses now classify as 'executive or professional' employees in order to avoid paying them overtime.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and STEVEN GREENHOUSE

lead_paragraph: President Obama this week will direct the Labor Department to revamp its regulations to require overtime pay for millions of workers.

headline.main: Obama Will Seek Broad Expansion of Overtime Pay
headline.print_headline: Obama Will Seek Broad Expansion of Overtime Pay
